title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The Build action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when there are no changes to build.
OB: The Build action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The Build action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there are changes to build.
SR: Fix the enablement logic of the Build action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective so that it is only enabled when there are changes to build.
